function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decline in car-based transportation infrastructure","Impact":"Reduced access to efficient transportation, potential increase in congestion and air pollution","Mitigation":"Investment in alternative transportation infrastructure, promotion of sustainable modes of transport","Technologies":"Smart traffic management systems, urban planning software","People":"Residents, commuters, city planners","Owner":"City governments, urban planners"},{"Description":"Push for information-based construction management methods","Impact":"Inefficient project management, potential increase in errors and delays in construction projects","Mitigation":"Implementation of digital construction management platforms, training in information-based methods","Technologies":"Construction project management software, BIM tools","People":"Construction managers, project teams, contractors","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers"}]}
